source.title: Represent the fixed volume config name.

target.title: Represent the moving volume config name.

seed.title: Represent the segment name for calculating registration tranform.

segmentation.title: Represent the segment name lists of the moving volume that would be transformed. Empty value means applying transformation onall segmentation volumes

offset.title: Set the translation offset of the initialized transform
offset.description: The initalized transform was calculated by the class "CenteredTransformInitializer".For some cases, the origin position between fixed image and moving image are quite different.Specifying an offset translation could help make better regsitration result.

output_transform.title: Represent the output path of the registration transform.

output_volume.title: Represent the output path of the volume data.

publish.title: Publishing state
publish.description:
Represent the index value of the publishing state.There are four different state level to control the config visiblity for different dev route: 
0-> Not publish (e.g. config tempalte)
1-> Publish to the internel developing stage
2-> Publish to the BETA testing stage
3 ~ 9 -> Placeholders for the new requirements of other stages
10-> Publish to the Live game

parent.title: Config Parent Path
parent.description: Represent the parent path, it would be used to perform a full copy of the object payload. Some of the settings are inherited from parent, the reset of settings are overrided by itself.

name.title: Object Name
name.description: It would be updated to the config file name automatically.It's a read-only property.
